metadata.title: DEPRECATED: Evaluate to true if the float datatype is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the float datatype and all of its valid operations.

modified.comment: Deprecating in favor of new OVAL Test Content

notes.note: Other tests that should be added are tests using special values (INF, -INF, and NaN) and tests using mixed floating point value representations.

criteria.comment: True if the equals operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the equals operation with a single equal float.
Check of the equals operation with a single unequal float.

criteria.comment: True if the not equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the not equal operation with a single equal float.
Check of the not equal operation with a single unequal float.

criteria.comment: True if the greater than operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the greater than operation with a single greater than float.
Check of the greater than operation with a single equal float.
Check of the greater than operation with a single less than float.

criteria.comment: True if the greater than or equal operation is supported

Check of the greater than or equal operation with a single equal float.
Check of the greater than or equal operation with a single less than float.

criteria.comment: True if the less than operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the less than operation with a single less than float.
Check of the less than operation with a single equal float.
Check of the less than operation with a single greater than float.

criteria.comment: True if the less than or equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the less than or equal operation with a single less than float.
Check of the less than or equal operation with a single equal float.
Check of the less than or equal operation with a single greater than float.

metadata.title: DEPRECATED: Evaluate to true if the int datatype is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the int datatype and all of its valid operations.

modified.comment: Deprecating in favor of new OVAL Test Content

notes.note: The "bitwise and" and "bitwise or" operations are currently not supported and will generate an error value for this test definition. Therefore, they should be commented out when running this test definition.

metadata.title: DEPRECATED: Evaluate to true if arithmetic operations are properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evaluate to true if the interpreter properly supports all of the valid arithmetic operations.

modified.comment: Deprecating in favor of new OVAL Test Content

notes.note: Tests oval:andy:tst:4 and oval:andy:tst:8 of this definition are unused since the Oval language does not yet support the type of test required to evaluate them.

criteria.comment: Test to make sure add is supported properly

criterion.comment: Check int + int result.
Check int + float result.
Check float + float result.

criteria.comment: Test to make sure multiply is supported properly

criterion.comment: Check int * int result.
Check int * float result.
Check float * float result.
